basics.name: Miguel Álvarez Herrera
basics.label: Bioinformatician
basics.summary: Bioinformatician and PhD candidate specializing in systems biology, SARS-CoV-2 evolution, and metabolic reconstruction, with a BSc in Biotechnology from USAL and an MSc in Bioinformatics from UVEG.

work.name: Institute for Integrative Systems Biology (I²SysBio, UVEG-CSIC; Paterna, Spain)
work.summary: PhD candidate at the Pathogenomics laboratory working on evolution of SARS-CoV-2 and multiomic characterization of MTBC host association.

work.name: Institute for Integrative Systems Biology (I²SysBio, UVEG-CSIC; Paterna, Spain)
work.summary: Global Health platform (CSIC PTI+ Salud Global): real-time surveillance of SARS-CoV-2 mutations in the S protein.
